mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category(categoryID, name, cnt, rdate) VALUES(movieb_seq.nextval, #{name}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT categoryID, name, cnt, rdate, seqno, visible FROM category ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT categoryID, name, cnt, rdate, seqno, visible FROM category WHERE visible='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT categoryID, name, cnt, rdate FROM category WHERE categoryID = #{categoryID}
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET name = #{name}, cnt = #{cnt} WHERE categoryID = #{categoryID}
UPDATE category SET seqno = seqno - 1 WHERE categoryID=#{categoryID}
UPDATE category SET seqno = seqno + 1 WHERE categoryID=#{categoryID}
UPDATE category SET visible='Y' WHERE categoryID=#{categoryID}
UPDATE category SET visible='N' WHERE categoryID=#{categoryID}
